title: D'hide body

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragonhide bodies are a type of Ranged armour worn in the torso slot. 40 Defence is required to wear those armour pieces in addition to a certain Ranged level, depending on the type of dragonhide. Dragon Slayer I is also required to wear the green body. They can be crafted using three dragon leathers of appropriate colour.

content:
Dragonhide bodies are a type of Ranged armour worn in the torso slot. 40 Defence is required to wear those armour pieces in addition to a certain Ranged level, depending on the type of dragonhide. Dragon Slayer I is also required to wear the green body. They can be crafted using three dragon leathers of appropriate colour.

Types of d'hide bodies[edit | edit source]

  • Green d'hide body - Requires 40 Ranged to wear; trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 63 Crafting.
  • Blue d'hide body - Requires 50 Ranged to wear; trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 71 Crafting.
  • Red d'hide body - Requires 60 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 77 Crafting. Trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available.
  • Black d'hide body - Requires 70 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 84 Crafting. Trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available.

Blessed d'hide bodies[edit | edit source]

These all have the same offensive stats of Black d'hide body, more defensive stats, and an additional +1 prayer bonus. They can be obtained from completing a level 3 or 4 Treasure Trail.

  • Guthix dragonhide
  • Saradomin d'hide body
  • Zamorak d'hide body
  • Armadyl d'hide body
  • Bandos d'hide body
  • Ancient d'hide body
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Dragonhide bodies''' are a type of [[Ranged armour]] worn in the [[torso slot]]. 40 [[Defence]] is required to wear those armour pieces in addition to a certain [[Ranged]] level, depending on the type of dragonhide. [[Dragon Slayer I]] is also required to wear the [[green body]]. They can be [[Crafting|crafted]] using three [[dragon leather]]s of appropriate colour.

==Types of d'hide bodies==
*[[Green d'hide body]] - Requires 40 [[Ranged]] to wear; [[Green d'hide body (t)|trimmed]] and [[Green d'hide body (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 63 [[Crafting]].
*[[Blue d'hide body]] - Requires 50 Ranged to wear; [[Blue d'hide body (t)|trimmed]] and [[Blue d'hide body (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 71 Crafting.
*[[Red d'hide body]] - Requires 60 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 77 Crafting. [[Red d'hide body (t)|Trimmed]] and [[Red d'hide body (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available.
*[[Black d'hide body]] - Requires 70 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 84 Crafting. [[Black d'hide body (t)|Trimmed]] and [[Black d'hide body (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available.

==[[Blessed body|Blessed d'hide bodies]]==
These all have the same offensive stats of [[Black d'hide body]], more defensive stats, and an additional +1 [[prayer bonus]]. They can be obtained from completing a level 3 or 4 [[Treasure Trail]].
*[[Guthix dragonhide]]
*[[Saradomin d'hide body]]
*[[Zamorak d'hide body]]
*[[Armadyl d'hide body]]
*[[Bandos d'hide body]]
*[[Ancient d'hide body]]
